TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatusBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示 Windows 状态栏控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows status bar control.

summary.span: 尽管 替换了早期版本的 控件并添加了功能；但是也可选择保留 以备向后兼容和将来使用。

span.span: Although replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，控件包含对象，其中每个显示文本和/或一个图标。Typically, a control consists of objects, each of which displays text and/or an icon. 你还可以提供所有者绘制面板，以提供自定义面板如进度栏或一系列图像显示你的应用程序的状态。You can also provide owner-drawn panels to provide custom panels such as a progress bar or a series of images that displays the state of your application. A控件通常会显示有关上查看的对象信息，对象的组件或与你的应用程序中的该对象操作相关的上下文信息。A control typically displays information about an object being viewed on a , the object's components, or contextual information that relates to that object's operation within your application. 控件提供使您能够自定义控件的外观的属性。The control provides properties that enable you to customize the appearance of the control. 如果显示在窗体可调整大小，可以使用属性要向用户指示可调整窗体的窗体右下角显示大小调整手柄。If the is displayed on a form that can be resized, you can use the property to display a sizing grip in the lower-right corner of the form to indicate to users that the form can be resized. 属性使您能够显示在面板中的你要显示的值或的控件属性。The property enables you to display panels within your or to display only the value of the property of the control. 默认 没有面板。The default has no panels. 若要将面板添加到可以使用方法类可通过访问的控件属性。To add panels to a you can use the method of the class that is accessible through the property of the control. 你还可以使用通过提供对象属性从控件中移除面板和访问特定来操作面板。You can also use the object provided through the property to remove panels from the control and access a specific to manipulate the panel. 如果你想要确定何时对象内单击控件，你可以创建的事件处理程序事件。If you want to determine when a object within a control is clicked, you can create an event handler for the event. 若要执行所有者描述的操作面板上，你可以创建的事件处理程序事件。To perform owner-draw operations on a panel, you can create an event handler for the event. 传递给事件处理程序的事件数据提供有关要绘制的面板的信息和要用来执行绘制任务对象。The event data passed to the event handler provides information on the panel to draw and a object to use to perform drawing tasks. 当你创建的实例，读/写属性设置为初始值。When you create an instance of , the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件在窗体上，添加两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 之一对象，名为`panel1`，显示的应用程序状态文本。One of the objects, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个命名`panel2`、 显示当前日期，并使用属性类来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性以确保显示多个面板而不是一个标准面板，并使用与属性来访问方法若要添加到面板。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此示例还使用， ， ，和属性，以初始化对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例需要在示例中定义的方法定义并从的构造函数调用。This example requires that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认 没有面板。The default has no panels. 当你创建的实例，以下的读/写属性设置为初始值。When you create an instance of , the following read/write properties are set to initial values. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||| ||`false`| ||`true`| 你可以更改任何通过单独属性调用这些属性的值。You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造并用， ， ， ，和成员以及如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a and use the , , , , and members and how to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请在窗体中粘贴以下代码。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. 调用`InitializeStatusBarPanels`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 处置由 占用的资源（内存除外）。

span.span: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此控件是否应该使用辅助缓冲区重绘其图面以减少或防止闪烁，但此属性对 控件不起作用。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer to reduce or prevent flicker, however this property has no effect on the control

value.span: 如果控件具有次要缓冲区，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control has a secondary buffer; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置不起任何作用控件，因此它不会显示在设计器或 intellisense。Setting this property has no effect on the control, therefore it is not shown in the designer or by IntelliSense.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DrawItem As StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler

summary.span: 当所有者描述的状态栏控件的可视特征发生变化时，发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn status bar control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此事件在所有者绘制执行绘制操作控件。You can use this event to perform drawing operations in an owner-drawn control. 例如，如果显示一个所有者绘制显示一个进度栏，可以使用此事件来执行进度栏在绘制面板上。For example, if you display an owner-drawn that displays a progress bar, you can use this event to perform the drawing of the progress bar on the panel. 为通过事件提供数据对象作为参数传递给事件处理程序使您能够确定需要绘制的面板和用于绘制到面板。The data provided to the event through the object passed as a parameter to the event handler enables you to determine the panel that needs to be drawn and the to use to draw to the panel. 此事件仅时引发属性中控件设置为。This event is only raised when the property of a in a control is set to . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个所有者绘制显示自定义背景和当前日期。The following code example demonstrates how to create an owner-drawn that displays a custom background and the current date. 此示例需要你已连接事件控件添加到示例中定义的事件处理程序。This example requires that you have connected the event of a control to the event handler defined in the example. [!code-cpp[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个所有者绘制显示自定义背景和当前日期。The following code example demonstrates how to create an owner-drawn that displays a custom background and the current date. 此示例需要你已连接事件控件添加到示例中定义的事件处理程序。This example requires that you have connected the event of a control to the event handler defined in the example. [!code-cpp[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar.DrawItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar.DrawItem/VB/form1.vb#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PanelClick As StatusBarPanelClickEventHandler

summary.span: 当单击 控件上的 对象时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a object on a control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此事件来执行任务时中的面板控件被单击。You can use this event to perform tasks when a panel within a control is clicked. 为通过事件提供数据传递到事件处理程序参数可用于确定为的被用户单击以便在所选面板上执行任务。The data provided to the event through the passed as a parameter to the event handler enables you to determine the that was clicked by the user in order to perform tasks on the selected panel. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ， ， ，和成员以及如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and members and how to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请在窗体中粘贴以下代码。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. 调用`InitializeStatusBarPanels`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Panels As StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection

summary.span: 获取控件中所包含的 面板集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of panels contained within the control.

value.span: 包含 控件的 对象的 。

span.span: A containing the objects of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以显示多个面板为你的应用程序的用户提供信息。The control can display a number of panels to provide information to the user of your application. 例如，当前时间或文件下载的进度，可以显示一个面板。For example, a panel could display the current time or the progress of a file download. 显示每个面板控件是的一个实例类。Each panel displayed by the control is an instance of the class. 属性使您能够获取对的集合的引用中当前存储的对象控件。The property enables you to obtain a reference to the collection of objects that are currently stored in the control. 通过此引用，你可以将面板添加、 删除面板、 访问的特定面板在集合中，并获得数中的面板控件。With this reference, you can add panels, remove panels, access a specific panel within the collection, and obtain a count of the panels in the control. 有关可以与面板的集合执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅类参考主题。For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the panel collection, see the class reference topics. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件在窗体上，添加两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 之一对象，名为`panel1`，显示的应用程序状态文本。One of the objects, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个对象，名为`panel2`、 显示当前日期，并使用属性类来显示当前时间。The second object, named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性以确保显示多个面板而不是一个标准面板，并使用与属性来访问方法若要添加到面板。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此示例还使用， ， ，和属性，以初始化对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例需要在示例中定义的方法定义并从的构造函数调用。This example requires that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowPanels { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示已添加到控件中的任何面板。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether any panels that have been added to the control are displayed.

value.span: 如果显示面板，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if panels are displayed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，控件显示的值其属性时没有任何面板。By default, the control displays the value of its property without any panels. 当`ShowPanels`设置为`true`、 任何中指定的对象显示控件。When `ShowPanels` is set to `true`, any objects specified in the control are displayed. 创建的实例时最初创建没有面板类。No panels are initially created when you create an instance of the class. 您可以添加到面板控件通过使用方法类。You can add panels to a control by using the method of the class. 可以通过访问此集合类属性。This collection class can be accessed through the property of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建控件在窗体上，添加两个对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 之一对象，名为`panel1`，显示的应用程序状态文本。One of the objects, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个命名`panel2`、 显示当前日期，并使用属性类来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用属性以确保显示多个面板而不是一个标准面板，并使用与属性来访问方法若要添加到面板。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 此示例还使用， ， ，和属性，以初始化对象。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例需要在示例中定义的方法定义并从的构造函数调用。This example requires that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SizingGrip { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在控件的右下角显示大小调整手柄。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a sizing grip is displayed in the lower-right corner of the control.

value.span: 如果显示大小调整手柄，则值为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if a sizing grip is displayed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于显示大小调整手柄以调整窗体时向用户提供相对值。You can use this property to display a sizing grip to provide an indication to the user when a form is resizable. 如果属性你设置为不是可调整大小，如边框样式或，应设置属性`false`以做窗体可防止用户调整大小。If the property of your is set to a border style that is not resizable, such as or , you should set the property to `false` to prevent the user from thinking that the form can be resized. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ， ， ，和成员以及如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and members and how to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请在窗体中粘贴以下代码。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. 调用`InitializeStatusBarPanels`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理程序。Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user will be able to tab to the .

value.span: 如果 Tab 键将焦点移至 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the tab key moves focus to the ; otherwise .
The default is .

summary.span: 获取或设置与 控件关联的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text associated with the control.

value.span: 与 控件关联的文本。

span.span: The text associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示由控件显示的文本。This property represents the text displayed by the control. > [!CAUTION] > 控件显示只有一个字符串的前 127 个字符。The control displays only the first 127 characters of a string. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要运行该示例，请在窗体中粘贴以下代码。To run the example, paste the following code in a form. 调用`InitializeSimpleStatusBar`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeSimpleStatusBar` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler/VB/form1.vb#1)]
